data_table.description: Hospital Abstraction Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HRAA01C
variable.description: [Medical Abstraction]. Primary admission diagnosis (Removed from HRA and CHI1A). [Specify if diagnosis is not ICD coded] [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA09A
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Does this person have health insurance? (moved to CHIA Q5A). Q9.A [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA09B1
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Prepaid insurance or health plan, such as BC/BS or HMO (moved to CHIA Q5B). Q9.B1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA09B2
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Medicare (moved to CHIA Q5B). Q9.B2 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA09B3
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Medicaid (moved to CHIA Q5B). Q9.B3 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA09B4
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Other (moved to CHIA Q5B). Q9.B4 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA12
variable.description: [Enter on CFDB form]. Did an emergency medical service unit transport the patient to this hospital? (moved to CHIA Q7 ). Q12 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA13A
variable.description: [First transfer]. Was the patient transferred from or to another acute care hospital? (moved to CHIA Q8 ). Q13a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA13C1
variable.description: [First transfer]. Was the patient transferred a second time? (moved to CHIA Q8C1). Q13c1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA13D
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was this an in-catchment hospital? (moved to CHIA Q8D ). Q13d [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA17
variable.description: [Second transfer]. What was the disposition of the patient on discharge? Q17 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA18
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was an autopsy performed? Q18 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA19A
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was the patient either dead on arrival or did he/she die in the emergency room? Q19a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA19E
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was there (an) acute episode(s) of pain or discomfort anywhere in the chest, left arm or shoulder or jaw either just before death or within 72 hours of death? Q19e [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA19F
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is there a history of myocardial infarction prior to onset of this event? Q19f [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA19G
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did a myocardial infarction occur within four weeks of this event? Q19g [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is there any history of angina pectoris or coronary insufficiency? Q19h [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA19I
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is there any history of any other chronic ischemic heart disease? Q19i [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Do the discharge diagnoses include any 410 or 411 codes? Q20a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA20D
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is there mention of acute myocardial infarction [MI] in the discharge summary? Q20d [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is this person a cohort participant? Q20e1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA20E3
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Is any cardiac enzyme above the normal limit? Q20e3 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA20E4

variable.name: HRAA21D

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did acute cardiac symptoms begin prior to arrival at this hospital? Q23a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. What was the primary diagnosis or reason for admission to this hospital? Q24a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA24B

variable.name: HRAA25A
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was there an acute episode(s) of pain or discomfort anywhere in the chest, left arm or shoulder or jaw, either within 72 hours prior to arrival to this hospital, or in conjunction with the in-hospital CHD event defined in Item 24b? Q25a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA25C
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did this pain or discomfort specifically involve the chest? Q25c [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA25D
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was the discomfort or pain diagnosed as having a non-cardiac origin? Q25d [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. First recorded diastolic blood pressure (mmHg). Q21b [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA21C
variable.description: [Second transfer]. First recorded pulse rate (bpm). Q21c [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA11B
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Time Hh: mm of arrival at hospital (moved to CHIA Q6B). Q11b [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA25E
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Non-cardiac source of chest pain. Q25e [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA25F
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did the patient die? Q25f [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA25G
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Approximately how long was it from the onset of this event to death? Q25g [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA26A
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was coronary reperfusion (coronary angioplasty, coronary atherectomy, bypass, intravenous or intracoronary thrombolysis) attempted in the first 24 hours after onset of this event? Q26a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA26B
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Approximately how long was it between event onset and attempt at reperfusion? Q26b [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA27
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Was the patient ever in a CCU/ICU or telemetry bed during this hospitalization? Q27 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA28A
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Were any of the following mentioned as being present during this hospital stay? Shock or cardiogenic shock (pump failure). Q28a [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did shock occur within the first 24 hours after onset of this event? Q28a1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did CHF or pulmonary edema occur within the first 24 hours after onset of this event? Q28b1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Were any of the following mentioned as being present during this hospital stay? Ventricular fibrillation or cardiac arrest or asystole. Q28e [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA28E1
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Did ventricular fibrillation or cardiac arrest occur within the first 24 hours after onset of this event? Q28e1 [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA28F
variable.description: [Second transfer]. Were any of the following mentioned as being present during this hospital stay? Pulmonary Embolus Present? Q28f [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Second transfer]. Were any of the following mentioned as being present during this hospital stay? Stroke Present? Q28g [Hospital Abstraction Form]

variable.name: HRAA28H
